text:
Company: Lewis PLC  
Role: Technical Investigator  

Company Background:  
Lewis PLC is a forward-thinking leader in the tech industry, committed to delivering innovative solutions across various sectors. We are dedicated to fostering a diverse and inclusive work environment where all employees feel valued and empowered.

Job Description:  
We are seeking a dedicated and detail-oriented Technical Investigator to join our dynamic team. The successful candidate will play a crucial role in examining and resolving technical issues, ensuring our products and services meet the highest standards of quality and reliability.

Responsibilities:  
- Conduct thorough investigations into technical problems and provide detailed reports.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and resolve issues.
- Ensure compliance with industry standards and regulations.
- Analyze data to detect trends and recommend improvements.
- Maintain accurate documentation of findings and actions taken.

Qualifications and Experience:  
- Bachelor’s degree in a related field such as Computer Science, Engineering, or Information Technology.
- At least 3 years of experience in technical investigation or a similar role.
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
- Excellent verbal and written communication abilities.
- Familiarity with industry trends and best practices.

Perks and Benefits:  
- We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. The salary for this position ranges from €45,000 to €65,000, based on your experience and skills.
- Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance.
- Generous paid time off and holiday policies.
- Professional development opportunities and tuition reimbursement.
- Flexible work hours and remote work options.

Equal Opportunity Employer:  
We welcome applicants of all races, genders, and orientations. Lewis PLC is committed to building a diverse and inclusive workplace. We encourage candidates from all backgrounds to apply.
